turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can I assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to get some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get a quad espresso campana.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a quad espresso campana with skim milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat that one more time?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have a a quad espresso campana with skim milk and whipped cream, did I get it right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A quad espresso campana with skim milk and whipped cream, yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I I want to get it from the the Starbucks on Broadway in Oakland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on broadway and Oakland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text.
